##### An example of how Python and R can be used together through the use of reticulate
```{r}
library(reticulate)
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
mat1=np.array([[1,2],[3,4]])
```

```{r}
mat2<-solve(py$mat1)
mat2
```

```{python}
np.dot(mat1,r.mat2).round()
```
